title: Which champions are the strongest for Low MMR solo carry, easy to play (mechanic-less, dominant)?
body:
Any champions Dominant in Early and Late Game that are easy and uncounterable?

EDIT: Thanks for the suggestions. They work, but not with brainless teams. I got my champions and I will post a thread why they are and who they are. Stay tuned if you wish to see my suggestions. I changed my core gameplay to make them work, but they did good.

replies.body: {{champion:1}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:74}}
Tryndamere, Master Yi, Malphite.

Tryndamere - Maybe

Yi - Killable, sucks, lack of CC, a small Stun and he is dead. Only Quicksilver Sash or Cleanse saves him.
Malphte - Kiteable, I dont want to wait 150s for R, no thanks.
Your choice, I personally see them as easy to play and easy to win champions.
Cannot say much, do you have some midlaner in mind?
Swain. So much swain.

Sorry no "easy" Midlaner comes to mind for carrying... Making pick sure, but midlaners generally lack solo play(like 2v1) potential and rely on teammates to facetank if the enemy groups... Viegar, kennen, lissandra swain.

{{champion:268}} 
But serious {{champion:1}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:240}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:10}}

Well I mained Azir tbh :D

Not easy. And maybe only agree for Rammus, others are shit.
trust me, amumu is a god in bronze. just try it.
I saw... AP Amumu. He needs a nerf.

{{champion:53}} 

Land a Q.
Profit.
GG.
any splitpusher

You mean Nasus? I am a good player, but I need to learn some picks that are hard to kill. Even if skilled BTW. I have the skill, but not the time and luck to learn all the game, since school and shit. I tried all. But these players tire me.

no nasus takes too long too scale, you don't need hard to kill champs in low elo, you want champs that kill the enemy fast and take tower fast.

for top champs like trynd, jax , fiora, riven

jungle champs like yi, olaf, nocturne

mid champs like Diana, yasuo

They all have a specific splitpushing playstyle, so macro play and map awareness is key with these champs, avoid teamfights and just take objectives. Winning lane hard is also key for a quick victory, so learn to play aggro and how to trade well

Long? 10th minute he is a beast, but as you say. Tryndamere is fine, as for mid. I hate Diana, cannot play her. Such stupid playstyle. I mained Yasuo. 120k in total with him. Is there any choise to carry and win before min 15. I want to counter these champions: Vi, Shyvana, Hecarim, Veigar, Rumble, Teemo. All else is welcome to face me. You have a solution?

get good, lol

it honestly doesn't matter what you play, if you are good you can easily carry the game

splitpushing is just the easiest method of winning in low elo

But my team cannot hold 5 stupid people in mid, while I push top alone to end them. I just push, I do it every game. I said to them objectives. They just teamfight and die like retards. I have been in teamfights with these noobs in like just 3-4% of all my ranked career, I bet all-in on push, they cannot hold them not to recall, so hard to kill 5 guys in 4v5 when they come like retards. I cannot play with such players. If I had a player that had half a brain to come and split with me, we win all the games, but no one does come, we ace them, top full of minions, but who came? No one. Only me. And pushed to inhibitor and died. Since no help. We could end. But we lost.

«get good» - I am not a magician, I do not have a magic wand to say «git gut» and to become good. Not that easy with such player base.

I have been doing well with Yorick and ZZ Port

You still have games where more then one play has NO clue and you cant win ever (even with a LCS player) but if your team has half a brain you can do well.

I also do Ziggs Mid/Bot but its not as good as Yorick

Bad news, they do not have a tenth of brain half-piece (20th) of it. They have lack of learning potential. Always when I get easy champion like Tryndamere, I carry them but I feel bad for the opposite team too. I need some pick that will make them forget of the loss. Someone like Mordekaiser. But when my team is garbage? What then? What can I do to tell them: "Your fault, not mine". They literally bet all faults on me going all-in with the statement to Riot «flamer». When will I stop getting restrictions, even got a permanent ban and I said bye money for such game which's owners do not care. I reported like 50 people and 1 or 2 got punished but the others the also deserved? I was not that a flamer. I am patient but EU has a law «To the fire with fire.», obviously...

That's all needed to say.

This is not just me being biased, {{champion:161}} is extremely strong in both phases of the game.

The only trade off is he is slightly harder to learn the some other easy to play champs (Ex. {{champion:11}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:23}} )

But his poke in lane is great, your q is an amazing tool for harass along with your w, his e is a great combo opener or disengage, and when team fights start to breakout, he just needs to land one combo and a fight can be swayed heavily, his true damage is super high late game, and can shred tanks if fed enough.

Aside from that, some others i suggest are: {{champion:1}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:45}}

> [{quoted}](name=KmeckYT Gaming,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jWRYAIVw,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-01-25T22:37:08.473+0000)
>
> Any champions Dominant in Early and Late Game that are easy and uncounterable?

{{champion:64}}
Late game and early man... And Lee is not really easy. You need a bit mind to play him. Well I can, since I like him, but no, not a carry late game, maybe as a tank, but no.

Depends on your style and what rank you're at. Each rank has it own set of champs that's considered overpowered and that helps you climb. Example; if you're bronze and you main support, your best bet is probably blitzkek. Platimun and you play JG? I believe Hecarim does well. 

Although be warned, this makes the game very boring.
I main Jungle and Top in this ELO Cancer (not hell, worse than hell).
